about_the_game:
Jump into the world of Brawlygon!
Master mechanical mix-ups as the robot, armor aggressive attacks as the knight, practice patience and precision as the cowboy, or mystify the mid-range as the mage, there's a wide variety of fighters to choose from, as fighters from around the world, through time, and across dimensions, have come together, to beat the polygons out each other! With a planned base roster of 12+ characters (possibly more), and additional characters after launch.

Brawlygon sets out to fill the gap between high and low difficulty fighting games, being approachable, yet complex. implementing the simple control scheme of platform fighters, and a good variety of attacks for you to play around with, all while you dodge, dash, run and roll around the stage with a wide array of defensive and mobility options! There're also a few twists thrown into the genre, like making defense the most effective way to build meter, while introducing "Piercing" attacks, which deal more damage on BLOCK than on hit! Every character also utilizes the "stamina" and "energy" meter differently, so you'll have to learn how manage each individual fighter's resources effectively!

Features (Currently):
8 Playable Characters
Local Multiplayer
Single player arcade mode, and challenges
Control Remapping

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 10th gen, Ryzen 5000 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 30 series, Radeon RX 6000 series
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 12th gen, Ryzen 6000 series
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070, Radeon RX 6700

short_description: A stylized, low poly fighting game, with warriors from various eras and worlds! Simple controls make it easy to learn, with plenty of tools to play around with for those who want more depth! “Piercing” attacks shake up the genre, by dealing high chip damage!
